topic: Climate change is the biggest threat facing humanity today. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
essayText:
Climate change is very big problem today. I agree its biggest threat for human.

First, weather changing everywhere. Too hot in summer and strange rain pattern. Ice melting and water level going up. This very dangerous for people live near sea. My city also getting hotter every year.

Second, climate change make people sick. Air pollution bad for breathing. When too hot old people die. Also new disease coming because temperature change. Food also problem because crop not growing good.

But some people say other thing more dangerous like nuclear bomb or war. Maybe they right but climate change happening now not future.

We must do something fast. Stop using petrol car and factorys stop pollution. Government should make law for protect environment.

To conclude climate change biggest problem because affect everyone life and getting worse. We need action now or too late.
